comment.author: 62508825@N00
comment._content:
Supplement to the London Gazette January 3, 1918
Essex Regt. —2nd Lt. C.P.L. Anderson to be Lt. 1st July 1917

comment.author: 62508825@N00
comment._content: Charles P L Anderson married Amelia M Higgs in W. Ham 2nd qr 1915                    C P L Anderson died 2nd qr 1949 aged 56 in Hampstead.                                                 Source FreeBMD

comment.author: 64288588@N05
comment._content:
Charles Percy Lewis Anderson born 1892 in Waltham, Essex. Died 21 Jun 1949 at 11 Lyndhurst Gardens, Hampstead. Previously of Oak Lodge, Dukes Wood Avenue, Gerards Cross.

In the 1911 census he was a Bank Clerk and had spent the night at 18&19 Fleet Street, the home of Edward Adams, Bank Manager.

comment.author: 104318228@N08
comment._content: I've been looking at these photos of these brave men over the last few days and although I've said it before, I'll say it again, they don't make MEN like this any more.
